类 CityList

java.lang.Object
com.example.listcity.CityList
public class CityList extends Object
A class that maintains a list of City objects. This class provides functionality to add, remove, retrieve, and query cities. The list is kept sorted alphabetically by city name when retrieved.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CityList

      public CityList()

  • 方法详细资料

    • add

      public void add(City city)
      Adds a city to the list if the city does not already exist. Equality is determined by the City class's equals() method, which checks both city name and province.
      参数:
      city - the city to add to the list
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the city already exists in the list

    • getCities

      public List<City> getCities()
      Returns a sorted list of all cities in alphabetical order by city name. The list is sorted using the City class's compareTo() method.
      返回:
      a sorted list of cities

    • hasCity

      public boolean hasCity(City city)
      Checks whether the given city exists in the list. Equality is determined by the City class's equals() method, which checks both city name and province.
      参数:
      city - the city to check for in the list
      返回:
      true if the city exists in the list, false otherwise

    • delete

      public void delete(City city)
      Removes a city from the list. If the city is found, it is removed from the list. If the city is not found, an exception is thrown. Equality is determined by the City class's equals() method, which checks both city name and province.
      参数:
      city - the city to delete from the list
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the city does not exist in the list

    • countCities

      public int countCities()
      Returns the total number of cities in the list.
      返回:
      the number of cities in the list
